Container.Name: sickchill
Container.Overview: Sickchill(https://github.com/SickChill/SickChill) is an Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
Container.Changes:
### 2022-02-17 - Rebase to alpine 3.17.
### 2022-02-17 - Rebase to alpine 3.15.
### 2021-11-20 - Modify binary usage from SickChill.py to SickChill.
### 2021-05-14 - Add linuxserver wheel index.
### 2021-02-12 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13. Add python certifi.
### 2020-09-17 - Update dependencies.
### 2020-09-06 - Switch to python3, install pip package.
### 2020-04-22 - Switch to git clone and using git tags for versioning.
### 2020-01-09 - Remove creating data volumes, fix build args for armhf and aarch64.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-04-17 - Adding Nodejs dependancy.
### 2019-03-31 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2018-10-10 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: will map the container's port 8081 to port 8081 on the host

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: this will store config on the docker host

Config.Name: Path: /downloads
Config.Description: this will store any downloaded data on the docker host

Config.Name: Path: /tv
Config.Description: this will allow sickchill to view what you already have
